Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class LessOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessOptionsBuilder
  • public class LessOptionsBuilder
extends Object

    Responsible for creating new instances of the LessOptions.

    Example code: 

     LessOptions options = null;
 
 // create options with enabled code compression
 options = new LessOptionsBuilder().compressOn().build();
 
 // create options with enabled strict units and disabled IE compatibility
 options = new LessOptionsBuilder().strictUnitsOn().ieCompatibilityOff().build();
 
 // use existing options object to create a new one
 boolean compression = false;
 options = new LessOptionsBuilder(options).compress(compression).build();
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    FileSystemOptionBuilder, FileSystemOptionsBuilder, LessVariableOptionsBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LessOptionsBuilder()
      Constructs a new instance.
      LessOptionsBuilder​(LessOptions options)
      Constructs a new instance and copies options into this builder.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LessOptionsBuilder banner​(CharSequence banner)
      Sets a banner which will be inserted to a source file before the compilation (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder bannerOff()
      Clears a value of the banner option (default: off).
      LessOptions build()
      Builds a new instance of the LessOptions.
      LessOptionsBuilder compress​(boolean compress)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compressed (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder compressOff()
      Disables a CSS code compression (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder compressOn()
      Enables a CSS code compression (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder encoding​(CharSequence encoding)
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code (default: null - means platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder encoding​(Charset encoding)
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code (default: null - means platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder encodingPlatformDefault()
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code to platform default (default: platform default encoding).
      LessOptionsBuilder fileSystems​(FileSystemOption... fileSystems)
      Sets available file systems (default: LessOptions.DEFAULT_FILE_SYSTEMS).
      LessOptionsBuilder fileSystems​(Collection<? extends FileSystemOption> fileSystems)
      Sets available file systems (default: LessOptions.DEFAULT_FILE_SYSTEMS).
      protected LessOptions getOptions()
      Returns an internal state of the builder.
      LessOptionsBuilder globalVariables​(LessVariableOption... globalVariables)
      Sets global variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder globalVariables​(Collection<? extends LessVariableOption> globalVariables)
      Sets global variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder globalVariablesOff()
      Clears global variables (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder ieCompatibility​(boolean ieCompatibility)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: true).
      LessOptionsBuilder ieCompatibilityOff()
      Sets that a CSS code does not have to be compatible with IE browser (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder ieCompatibilityOn()
      Sets that a CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder includePaths​(CharSequence... includePaths)
      Sets available include paths (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder includePaths​(Collection<? extends CharSequence> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder includePathsOff()
      Clears available include paths (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder javaScript​(boolean javaScript)
      Sets whether a compiler should allow usage of JavaScript language (default: true).
      LessOptionsBuilder javaScriptOff()
      Disallows usage of JavaScript language (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder javaScriptOn()
      Allows usage of JavaScript language (default: on).
      LessOptionsBuilder lineNumbers​(LineNumbersValue lineNumbers)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate inline source-mapping (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder lineNumbersAll()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks and @media queries (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder lineNumbersComments()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in comments blocks (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder lineNumbersMediaQuery()
      Enables generating inline source-mapping in @media queries (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder lineNumbersOff()
      Disables generating inline source-mapping (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      LessOptionsBuilder modifyVariables​(LessVariableOption... modifyVariables)
      Sets modify variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder modifyVariables​(Collection<? extends LessVariableOption> modifyVariables)
      Sets modify variables (default: []).
      LessOptionsBuilder modifyVariablesOff()
      Clears modify variables (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder relativeUrls​(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether a compiler should rewrite relative URLs (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder relativeUrlsOff()
      Disables rewriting relative URLs (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder relativeUrlsOn()
      Enables rewriting relative URLs (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder rootPath​(CharSequence rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in CSS code (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder rootPathOff()
      Clears a value of the root path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder silent​(boolean silent)
      Sets whether a compiler shouldn't log compilation warnings (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder silentOff()
      Enables logging compilation warnings (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder silentOn()
      Disables logging compilation warnings (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapBasePath​(CharSequence basePath)
      Sets a path that will be removed from each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also from the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapBasePathOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map base path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapLessInline​(boolean inline)
      Sets whether a compiler should include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapLessInlineOff()
      Sets that a compiler will not include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapLessInlineOn()
      Sets that a compiler should include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapRootPath​(CharSequence rootPath)
      Sets a path that will be prepended to each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also to the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapRootPathOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map root path option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapUrl​(CharSequence url)
      Sets a path which will overwrite the URL in the CSS that points at the Source Map map file (default: null).
      LessOptionsBuilder sourceMapUrlOff()
      Clears a value of the Source Map URL option (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictImports​(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether a compiler should disallow an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictImportsOff()
      Allows usage of @import operations inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictImportsOn()
      Disallows usage of @import operations inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictMath​(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictMathOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't try and process all maths in Less code (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictMathOn()
      Sets that a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictUnits​(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: false).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictUnitsOff()
      Sets that a compiler shouldn't guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: off).
      LessOptionsBuilder strictUnitsOn()
      Sets that a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: off).
